mapper.insert: insert into s_user_sec (id, user_question1, user_question2, user_question3, user_answer1, user_answer2, user_answer3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userQuestion1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userQuestion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAnswer1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAnswer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update s_user_sec set user_question1 = #{userQuestion1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_question2 = #{userQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_question3 = #{userQuestion3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_answer1 = #{userAnswer1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_answer2 = #{userAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_answer3 = #{userAnswer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_question1, user_question2, user_question3, user_answer1, user_answer2, user_answer3 from s_user_sec where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_question1, user_question2, user_question3, user_answer1, user_answer2, user_answer3 from s_user_sec
